Last.fm HTTP Client¶

Consume Last.fm web service

class sima.lib.simafm.SimaFM[source]¶

Last.fm http client

cache = False¶

HTTP cache to use, in memory or persitent.

Parameters:cache (BaseCache) – Set a cache, defaults to False.
get_similar(artist)[source]¶

Fetch similar artists

Parameters:artist (sima.lib.meta.Artist) – Artist to fetch similar artists from
Returns:generator of sima.lib.meta.Artist

Fetch artist top tracks
